name: Alice: Escape from Wonderland
overview: A single player, selectable answers text adventure written by Wilfried Elmenreich & Woz of Vintage Computing Carinthia and released in 2020. Alice - Escape from Wonderland is a game where you control Alice through a part of Wonderland trying to find things that help you escape. The game is a "Walk-and-Click" adventure. You can use WASD or a joystick to walk around. The cursor keys are used to move the inventory carousel (once you have multiple items there). The keys T,U,O,P,M,G,L are for selecting an interaction with objects, Return confirms it.
